author: pkluegl
msg: The notification of views when the cas document is exchanged will now be processed by a new listener and controlled by the AnnotationEditor in the doSetInput method. Adapted known view. I hope I haven't missed any. The update logic should be improved by using setInput (see comments on jira)...

author: scottbw
msg: Fix for RAVE-338; setting iFrame width to 100% enables resetting the widget width after maximising/minimizing. (Tested on Firefox, Opera, Safari and Chrome)

author: mturk
msg: Make a code a bit safer on invalid parameters. Make sure it doesn't crash at least
